https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lBV1pKXnbbkUcLtCGjBmYBepu09.jpg With mankind wiped from the face of the earth, God retires to a cabin in the woods to start the Adam-and-Eve experiment over again. As the decades go by and the familiar patterns - and setbacks - continue, this version of the first family will be faced with an unimaginable choice. Echoes
